texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:030000: You have already completed your trial period.
texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:030002: Once activated, you cannot switch the trial license to -requested- status!
texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:030004: Status could not be changed due to an unexpected error!
texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:030005: Start and end date can be updated when the trial license is in the -activated- status!

texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:030007: This trial license has already been activated!
texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:030008: The purchase date can be set only when the status is -purchased-!

texts.Volo.AbpIo.Domain:030011: You cannot delete a trial license when it is purchased!

texts.ABPDescription: ABP Framework is a complete infrastructure to create modern web applications by following the software development best practices and conventions.
texts.ShareYourExperiences: Share your experiences with the ABP Framework
texts.LearnLatestNewsAboutABPFramework: Get information about happenings in ABP like new releases, free sources, posts, and more.
texts.WouldLikeToReceiveMarketingMaterials: I would like to receive marketing materials like product deals & special offers.
texts.CommunityPrivacyPolicyConfirmation: I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
texts.WouldLikeToReceiveNotification: I would like to receive the latest news from abp.io websites.
texts.CommercialNewsletterConfirmationMessage: I agree to the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.
texts.SubscribeToNewsletterDescription: Get information about happenings in ABP like new releases, free sources, posts, and more.
texts.ABPCommercialIntroductionMessage: Pre-built application modules, advanced startup templates, rapid application development tooling, professional UI themes and premium support.
texts.MasteringTheABPFrameworkExplanation: Written by the creator of the ABP Framework, this book will help you gain a complete understanding of the framework and modern web application development techniques.

texts.ABPIO-CommonPreferenceDefinition: Get the latest news about ABP Platform like new posts, events and more.

texts.CopyNotSupportByYourBrowser: This feature does not work in the browser you are using.
texts.AbpDescription: ABP is an open source application framework focused on AspNet Core based web application development. Don't repeat yourself, focus on your own business code.
texts.Layout_AbpFramework_MetaTitle: ABP Framework - Open Source Web Application Framework
texts.CookieConsent_Explanation_1: We use cookies to give you the best experience on our website.
texts.CookieConsent_Explanation_2: If you continue to browse, then you agree to our Privacy policy and cookie policy..
texts.Error_Page_400_Title: There was a problem serving the requested page.
texts.Error_Page_400_Description_1: Usually this means that an unexpected error happened while processing your request.
texts.Error_Page_400_Description_2: If the problem persists, contact us at info@abp.io and we'll help get you on your way.
texts.Error_Page_404_Description_1: This is not the web page you're looking for.
texts.Error_Page_500_Description_1:
We track these errors automatically, but if the problem persists feel free to
contact us. In the meantime, try refreshing.
texts.Error_Page_500_Description_2: Contact with us at info@abp.io.
